website_summaries.verdict: This variety pack features mostly fruitwoods, including peach and cherry.
pros: A good sampling of chip flavors that you can combine for custom flavors
Good-size packages will last a while
A good value for the amount of chips you get in this pack
cons: The fruity flavors might not be the best choice for all meats

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas present for my brother in law, the "grill master". I was pleasantly surprised with the size of the packages. This was no "small" variety pack that would be seen with some variety packages we see at Christmas time. He was very happy with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Yummmm
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff right here! I've used all of the different woods for things, and the flavor is GREAT! I do wonder what would have happened if I had bought the Product Protection Plan for this tho. I mean, if I use the product as directed, it will turn to ash. Would they send me a replacement? :)
customer_reviews.author: NedZep

customer_reviews.title: Nice Variety Pack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wood chips for my husband to go along with a new smoker he got. You get so much product here! I couldn't believe the bags of chips were as big as they were for the price. He uses a mixture of different chips each time he smokes so this variety pack has been perfect. I gave it to him at Christmas time and he has plenty to still use. We smoke 2-3 times a month and I would guess these chips will last for the entire year. Great value and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Putzke Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good smoke and Flavor - Way way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Being new to smoking, I thought this seemed like a nice selection of different woods. The box of woods is super overprice! Wal-Mart has the same size bags/flavors at $1.88 a bag. Half of what this company is charging online. Be warned! Go to Wal-Mart!
customer_reviews.author: Lou Steinritz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of value here for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Nice wood chips. Haven’t used all the flavors yet but the apple and maple have good flavor addition. When I ordered I didn’t know it came with the little smoker tray. It’s nice. I wouldn’t recommend it being your only source of chip smoke though.
customer_reviews.author: Link Atrius

customer_reviews.title: You cant go wrong with these
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bags with nice wood chips. I have a Masterbuilt smoker and I have purchased these religiously a few times. Buying in a "variety pack" seems to be the most cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: JLV

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got into charcoal grills with the purchase of a Weber. I have been cooking just about everything from chicken wings, ribs and pork butts to beef brisket. This pack has been really nice to start out with. The variety is great to try different flavors. It was a decent bargain for what you get. I do wish the pieces were a little larger... some are, most aren’t. Regardless, the flavor is there.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of common woods
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of 4 common types off wood chips. Keep in mind that wood CHIPS are consumed (burn up) much quicker then wood CHUNKS, so require more frequent reloads. These work very well for my Propane Smoker and begin to smoke almost immediately, which is great. I usually mix the chips with chunks to get the quick initial smoke from the chips and also longer lasting smoke from the chunks
customer_reviews.author: Larry K

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a electric air smoker and wanted chips for it. These are great and the garage smelled terrific for a week. Although the chips were larger than I thought they worked great for a ham and it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used the maple chips, they burned pretty well and they added flavor to my food. I love how they include a chip tray to put on your grill, if you want to use your grill to smoke. I do with the bags came with a zip top so storing them would be a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good combination of chips. Uniform in size. Comes as listed. This was a birthday present for my father and he loved it! This is the brand that he uses to smoke all of his meat. We were very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: REvans

customer_reviews.title: Great sampler!
customer_reviews.text: A great way to sample a variety of chips. Plus it came with a spare smoker tray if you are using them in a charcoal grill. The cost is about the same or a bit cheaper than if you bought the chips in a store, but I can't always find there varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These wood chips are great. Used them for turkey and pork so far. Great flavor without using a lot. Even came with a little tray to use on the grill. Would definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Wood chips are much more like shavings from a pencil sharpener and not at all what it shown in the photos. Sent it back. Amazon denied me a refund for over 2 weeks. I had to argue with them for an hour to get the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Nemeck

customer_reviews.title: Five stars - will definitely order again
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of wood chips for a great price. I have only used the apple chips so far but expect the others to be just as good. I used the apple in conjunction with some jack daniels and boy was it good. Try it on some chicken, turkey, and bacon wrapped asparagus. The heavy duty pan that comes with it is great. I didn't even know it came with it! When I run out, I'll be re-ordering this.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of kiln dried wood chips
customer_reviews.text: Good selection of wood chips for using in your smoker. The chips are in sliver form and are not thick. The wood is dried and offers a good variety of fruit woods. The variety pack includes cherry, apple, peach, and maple.
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Extra effort from this Company! :)
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the wood chips yet, but I just had to leave a review today. Not only did all my products arrive, but there were some cool extras!!! We got a very nice steel tray-for the wood chips to go on the smoker/bbq and also a sticker! I, for one, always love getting a sticker with purchase. Brings out the child in me, I guess. Thanks, Western Premium BBQ Priducts!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Fast

customer_reviews.title: Using this make sure you eat first.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried the peach yet. The other bags really enhanced my grilling. I didn’t know it came with a box so I purchased the box with the lid. Both boxes going at the same time made my dinners knockouts with my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: the big kahuna

customer_reviews.title: Genuine fruit wood! No filler
customer_reviews.text: This cherry wood makes me think every other cherry chip bag I've bought is mostly filler. It's distinctly cherry, and quite strong. It's pretty standard pricing, but these are excellent. I can't wait to try the peach.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L Vinson

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice variety of smoking chips
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice variety of smoking chips. it has everything you need to get started with a new smoker. It would also make a nice gift for someone who already has a smoker!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Southard

customer_reviews.title: Great wood chips for smoking all your meats and veggies ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wood chips for smoking all your meats and veggies on! I've used most of them now and have been very pleased by all the flavors in here, and the box is a great bonus, makes it easier when you have a couple of them to switch them out.
customer_reviews.author: goldeneagle

customer_reviews.title: Makes adding smoke easy
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and used the cherry mixed with the jack Daniels chips that I also ordered and cooked a standing rib roast on the grill! delicious! The flavor it added was awesomely good. get them and mix them to create our own yummy flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J.

customer_reviews.title: Performed well
customer_reviews.text: Bought myself a small smoker and decided to branch out from mesquite chips. I haven't tried all the flavors yet, but the apple chips performed very well on my first try of them. Looking forward to more smoking and trying out all the varieties.
customer_reviews.author: jebavonct

customer_reviews.title: Produces large quantities of smoke 👌🤘
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of chips and the smell is so refreshing. Saving these for competition smoking
customer_reviews.author: Kyo

customer_reviews.title: Good flavors and value
customer_reviews.text: A great value and a great way to learn about the different smokes with different meats and to find one you like above all others.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Talbott

customer_reviews.title: Smokin!
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to use. Been using this company for all of my smoking cooking needs. Good stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for BBQers
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of woods for BBQ folks. This will definitely last quiet a while, love that they are resealable. Great combo of woods included. Purchased as gift for my hub.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a Meat Lover!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and they loved it because they are always trying different products to experiment with!

customer_reviews.title: Nice sampler pack of wood chips for getting started smoking
customer_reviews.text: Nice sampler pack of wood chips for getting started smoking, have only used about half of one bag smoked twice since I got it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and extra swag
customer_reviews.text: Amazon buyer for 10 plus years. First review. Great product and love the swag. Little smoker box and a sticker. It’s the little things. Bags are above average size also. And a great mix. Apple , cherry , maple , peach.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher frank

customer_reviews.title: Good middle ground for those wanting best of both worlds (propane/charcoal)
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy so far with the results. Noticeable flavor added to tri-tip, burgers and chicken so far. Not sure how well this is going to hold up over time but cheap enough to replace every few years.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Take another hit
customer_reviews.text: You can get all smoked out with this bundle. Works great in my smoker and adds a plethora of smoky flavors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I like that included in this order is a metal box to contain the wood chips. I use lump charcoal and containing the wet chips in a uniform manner is nearly impossible on lump charcoal. So much waste without the boxes. I am definitely a repeat buyer for this seller of wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really great box! I was nervous it would not have very much wood chips but I was beyond happy with the amount! The 4 bags of different flavor are amazing! They worked great! Great variety box for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Good price, interesting selection, though maybe not most versatile selection.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal to try a lot of different woods!!! This is a bag of fruity woods, which may not be super versatile for all different meats and things, but it's nice to have a selection of woods with subtle difference when you need them, without having to drop a bunch of money on big bags!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: The sent makes me hungry
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a smoker so I am still experimenting and learning how to use it fully. These chips smell awesome. Once I get a better system this should be great.
customer_reviews.author: Garry A

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift for a grill master
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as an anniversary gift and he loves it. He has been playing around with flavor combinations and we enjoy sampling his creations.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Super great value for the money. Smells great cooking meat. Great flavored. Enjoyed the peach flavor.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son who just got a smoker. He was happy with the product

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavors!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband- love the variety of flavors it offers and a little goes a long way in the smoker. Will repurchase.

customer_reviews.title: Bring the smoke!
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of chips. Nice, even smoking. Some of them are just slightly too big, but it’s not a major detection.

customer_reviews.title: Good selection, good price.
customer_reviews.text: We use these a lot so it made sense to order them from Amazon rather than run out and buy a package at a time. Lots cheaper too. I like to use both wood chips and wood chunks as the chips give an almost immediate smoke and the chunks give a long-lasting smoke. Also I don't have to refill the wood box as much.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good deal. If you're new to meat smoking, or want to learn about other wood chip types, this is a great sampler pack. You can usually get a single back this size for a little over $5, so having a variety pack at this price is great. This variety pack doesn't have oak, hickory, or mesquite, which are more heavily flavored wood. These are fruit woods, which go well with any type of meat (fish, chicken, pork, beef), particularly sausages. I usually smoke a sausage, like bratwurst, for one round of smoking, which is half a bag, for about 1.5 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Clark

customer_reviews.title: Smell and taste great.
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised, havent been able to use them all yest but plenty of chips for multiple uses. Smell and taste great.

product_meta.title: Western Premium BBQ Products BBQ Smoking Chips Variety Pack, 4 Pack
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionWestern Premium BBQ Products BBQ Smoking Chips Variety Pack. This variety pack includes four wood flavors and a reusable smoker tray. As one would expect, Maple is a great wood for cooking pork. But the sweetness it provides with its light, smoky flavor is also great with poultry, game birds, and vegetables. Peach wood produces a mild, fruity smoke flavor. A BBQ secret in the Southeast region of the United States for many years, this sweet smoke is great with pork, beef, or even fish. Apple wood produces a mild yet delicate smoke with a hint of sweetness to add a very distinctive flavor to meats grilled or smoked with it. Apple is great for pork, fish, poultry, and game birds. Cherry wood adds a mild and fruity smoke flavor similar to Apple but with a bit more punch. It is great for adding a reddish tone to the items you are cooking and is typically used with vegetables, seafood, chicken, and steaks. You can also mix the woods together to create a unique flavor of your own.
feature_bullets: Includes Maple, Peach, Apple, and Cherry
Can be used with Charcoal or use with gas grills or electric smokers
100% Natural Raw Wood made in the USA
Use the flavors separately or mix the woods together to create a unique flavor of your own

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars802 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
